Package robotcore

Interface Summary
State An interface for the states, all states should implement these 3 methods The run method should actually have a check in a sort of while loop to make sure that there is no interrupt needed
 

Class Summary
Configuration This class contains the fundation of a configuration class.
Coordinate location x , y and theata in degrees
Core This runs the main program for the competition.
LCDWriter high abstraction to facilate writing to LCD
Point Class implementing a basic point TODO: isn't this a standard library implementation? -ph
StateMachine This is the main state machine class, this will keep track of the current robot states callbacks on this class will change the robot state and thus affect its actions in the core
 

Enum Summary
CommunicationType Which communication type
Corners contains the 4 starting corners.
States This is similar to: http://www.javacodegeeks.com/2012/03/automaton-implementation-in-java.html If you want to look up the inspiration The states are: ERROR SETUP LOCALIZING TRAVELLING_TO_ZONE OBSTACLE_AVOID_TO_ZONE SEARCHING CAPTURE TRAVELLING_TO_END OBSTACLE_AVOID_TO_END RELEASE FINAL TODO: I'm still debating whether to keep this in one file or split it up.
